content: I love your games, they are one of the only ones I will spend money on. But the puzzles in this one, sometimes were nonsensical. Navigation wasn't straightforward, and I was lost for a good while before I realized I could move backwards out of some scenes. I answered one puzzle by luck, only to find the clue later, and it stayed in my inventory, leading to further confusion. Its a fun game, I felt more frustrated than accomplished.
Really enjoyed it. I like all games by this developer

All the games from this amazing company are phenomenal! The issue though is that there games are just too vast, having 101 slides in total. It's impossible to know where to use an item without having to zoom in on all the rooms on thr map. There's just too many slides.
Not quite as intuitive as the first one, but still very good
Excellent game! Very challenging! I was kind of sad when I finished the game
So fun! We play with the whole family on the projector.
Definitely more challenging than the first. Love both!
Love the all those games. This one, though, was for my taste a little bit too much of going back and forth and some of the challenges were really difficult.
Great adventure game. A little tricky in places but enjoyable.
Loved it. Brilliant. More please.

Love the Syntaxity games, this did not disappoint. Over the years I've got several for free but this time I paid so to support this great dev (though fast travel should be free to those who buy the game at full price imho). Game was great, hard in spots, good puzzles, several red herrings! Scene change oversensitive though. I was constantly thrown back and forth when touching within 1/3 of the edge--esp when you need to tap for hiding places! Made me queasy! Still,A+ game. Very solid, too..

The game would run smoothly if the puzzles worked in the same area and then the game could just evolve bigger the storyline is good but after playing and opening up 70 % of the areas, it becomes tedious constantly back and forth all the time...overall if there was a blackthorn castle 3 ? Would I play it...no because of all the back and forth its making me get bored of it.

Syntaxity has struck gold in my opinion. They're different from all the other games. The graphics are beautifully detailed. The puzzles are very hard but not impossible. I love the challenge of all their games and look forward to every new release.
Very in depth game.

I like to pay for games and then that's it. Take 20 Euro instead of 2...but leave me alone. Here the first quest is so unclear that you need a hint. For which you must pay. Uninstalled the garbage and put the developer on my "not a dime for the rest of my life"
Hard but very fun.
Best one yet
Super fun to play.
Some of the puzzles are way too random. Other than that. A good game.
Just love these games, good length and fun.
Fun!
I love the game, however, every time I try to solve the flute puzzle it doesn't work.
I understand that if I got a game for free there would be microtransactions. However, when I've paid for the game there should not be microtransactions.
Another great adventure from syntaxity. Plenty of areas, and puzzles to do.
I have played three of your games I love them
Very good game some puzzles are challenging. As the game has multiple locations it's annoying that they expect you to pay again to use the fast facility on the map! Would have been 5 stars otherwise.
some clues and games do not make sense
This was the most amazing journey.! I really had to work at it . BUT I FINISHED IT !
Plz Give me refund, this purchase been by accidently
Love all these games

Challenging. I think the developers need to go back, play this game for themselves. NOTE how disjointed some of the provided hints are in connection to the actual challenge or puzzle to be complete, as you will need the video hint to complete some. I play these types of games for enjoyment. This one was a bit annoying & a lil alarming, as a figure & a troll pop up with effects. Other than that, it's another great Syntaxity game. Pls make more games. I have bought most, already.
Fun game but I think it's unfair to pay for help & fast travel, when you have already paid for the game.
Brilliant
As in the 1st game, I hated o finish!! I really love them!
Fantastic and absorbing game. Beautiful graphics. Worth buying the hint package as not entirely straight forward, but that is part of this beautiful experience this game offers!
Excellent, up to the usual standards!!
Lovely relaxing game. More?
Its just about the same as the first blackthorn castle. Waste of money
Fun game
I fully enjoy these games!!!
Had to rely on the hints as some of the clues aren't as obvious as you would expect
This game was so fun. You must have hints and fast travel to complete though! It's worth the extra 2 dollars though! 5 stars!
Excellent, most helpful!

The game itself is wonderful. I enjoyed the puzzles and some were challenging but I managed to complete the game without paying for hints. Paying for fast travel was not nice of the developers and I refused. Fast travel would have made the game much easier. I think you should include it and raise the price a dollar. Paying for hints is pretty common but paying for using a map to jump to locations is new and I didn't like it.

A nice way to spend an evening. The puzzles were more of a challenge than the first one. Got stuck a few times because a couple of the clues just didnt make sense. I still dont know how I solved one of the puzzles, I just fiddled around until it worked. If you get stuck, remember to use the hedge clippers and fish more than once...
love all Blackthorn castle games ready for the next one...
Fun game with good puzzles!
It was quite enjoyable and chalenging
A challenge and fun.

1st one was better. Several puzzles here don't make sense or are arbitrary. I liked that it uses the same locations as the 1st one, and it is longer. Note that both the clues and the navigation jumps are a must, so that adds two bucks to the price. Still, I like this kind of game so I'm happy.
Amazing!!!
Good graphics, but difficult puzzles. Random numbered screens renders the game impossible without buying hints and short cuts unless the player is a genius!!! Buy it, but the game isn't worth it
What a twist!
Great graphics and some challenging puzzles. The hints were helpful. This was a really long game for what you pay. Well worth it!
This game was great. I have played all the games by Syntaxity and they never let you down. Well done with challenging game play and spectacular graphics bound together by an interesting story.

Good game overall and enjoyed solving it. Some puzzles / clues are a bit vague but overall challenging enough to be fun. My reason for 4 stars are the ingame purchases (especially the fast travel one). I found this rather absurd after having bought the game. Usually one buys something to be able to use it fully and without restrictions...
Tedious.The first game had puzzles and clues that felt intuitive. This game is simply a pile of trash.

This is a great sequel and has some challenging puzzles and some easy as well, the game has a fantastic vista for the adventurer to explore as well as loads of captivating interiors buildings and a wonderful and friendly Trol. It will cost very little to get the hints and also the fast travel options, also, the story line is very good and flows well, I played both and give excilance for this game very well done
Explain why I must pay to travel with the map when I already paid $4 for the game. What a rip-off!

While I have every game from Syntaxity , this is by far the worst when it comes to clues. Nothing makes sense! The clues do not help one bit. It is extremely frustrating!! The graphics are phenomenal. The length of the game is awesome! But the clues to the puzzles are absolutely useless!!!!! They do not make sense at all!!! Please take this into consideration with your next game. Have the clues make sense!!
Excellent game
Great game!
Difficult but rewarding.
Another great game from Syntaxity - I must admit to paying for the hints and fast move but it is quite possible to play the game without these

Good follow up to the first. A couple of puzzles obscure, one of which I got by chance rather than deduction. The only real criticism is paying extra, not for tips (if you can't do it you shouldn't be playing it and tips are free through YouTube anyway), but for avoiding the backwards and forwards travel, which is dull and slows the game down. This should be included in the original purchase price, even if it means paying extra. Well constructed and interesting other than that.
Great game! Love the adventure.
Awesome game, I enjoy puzzles and graphics were outstanding
Good puzzles. Many are different from others I've played just difficult enough to make it fun.
Didn't realise that this game was going to be a cash cow, buy this buy that buy the other. Thought those type of games went out with the plague. For me, a good game ruined by greed, what a shame.
Great game, more tricky than the first game
Loved the game but fast travel should be included im the price for all of the back and forth required. I believe this is the longest game yet and the best.
Excellent game. Some of the puzzles are extremely difficult though.
Enjoyable game but a lot of to and fro between locations. What really sucked was you have to pay extra after purchasing the game to unlock the fast move feature hence a star dropped.
Longest syntaxity game yet. Always fun. The puzzles were a little more obtuse this time round so Id recommend unlocking the hints and fast travel because there are so many scenes
I love all these style games by this group , awesome!!
Excellent fun, great puzzles, certainly gets the brain cells working
What a point and click adventure should be

I've enjoyed their past games a lot, but this one is a NO! Some puzzles are intuitive but others are really deceptive & clues are incomprehensible. Even after watching video clues on several I was baffled about how the non-video & video clues connected. They seem to be giving completely different information. I'm giving up on this one & hope I can get a refund.
Lots to do. Nice and long. Very mechanical. Very very nice music to match the fictional time period. Lots of zig zagging to utilize over a 100 scenes.
Very enjoyable and challenging.
Excellent adventure, puzzles were challenging without being too frustrating.
Really excellent puzzles that have you scratching your head for a long time! Recommend.
Played all their games......but really annoyed that you have to pay afurther £1:80 for tips and fast travel ....would rather pay a one off fee!!
I've completed it too quickly, not as long as original and puzzles are not as taxing, I was expecting much more. Mystery and getting brain ticking.

confusion, the clues were almost non relatable, more obvious needed and less vauge, the codes on doors were easily cracked three clues still in my pack. Repeated challenges, one troll for interaction and a Mouse. Medevil period with clocks, Steel combination lock cabinet by a telegraph pole, plumbing, mirrors etc. Some sense of period would have been better. I know it's fantasy but a little more realistic is better. Propper lock picking challenge, not guessing you make a potion etc. Ok though
Very enjoyable- some of the puzzles were trickier in this one, plenty to think about but not too taxing and the overall quality we've come to expect from Syntaxity - good job guys👍
Great game, as usual
I LOVE Syntaxity games! Had to cheat on a couple puzzles, but I loved going back to Blackthorn Castle and remembering the first game.

There were TWO cases of clues to puzzle solutions that were useless or even misleading that I found before ending play midway through. 1: At the dials in the locker. 2: Where the bronze gears are. In both cases I must cry foul! Anybody reading this please STAY AWAY from this app!
As always stunning graphics and great puzzles. My only complaint is I want more and quicker!

I love the series. I love this game. I only have 2 pieces of confusion. The first is that the flute puzzle doesn't connect with it's clue. It tells me to play incorrect notes. My second problem is when I try to restart the game after having beaten it, unless I close the app the backpack doesn't show up. I otherwise love how long you made the game, and how engaging it was.
Another great game from Syntaxity
Brilliant worth the wate well done I've got them all but this is the best x
Great Game
Fantastic games
